lookupAndBind

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> lookupAndBind(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                            java.lang.String label)
returns the set if there exists a associated to a set declaration in the session.. If no such set exists, the method creates a new session set and associates it to the session

Parameters:
request - the servlet request
label - set declaration
